video_prompt: Large white flower unfurls from gnarled tree, petals subtly shifting. Miniature pink cherry blossoms gently sway on an island, reflecting on rippling water. Small white flowers drift across the shimmering surface. Subtle specks of light twinkle in the darkening background.
image_prompt: A magical, elegant scene featuring a large, beautiful white flower with golden-edged petals and golden stamens, blooming from a small, gnarled tree. Below it, a small island with miniature pink cherry blossom trees and verdant green ground. The entire scene is set on a reflective water surface, mirroring the elements and scattered with floating white flowers. The background is a dark, indeterminate space with subtle specks of light. The overall mood is fantastical, peaceful, and dreamlike.
refined_video_prompt: Petals gracefully unfurl and subtly shift. Pink blossoms gently sway, their reflections dancing on rippling water. White petals drift across a shimmering surface. Subtle specks of light twinkle as the background gradually darkens.
